_sText:
------------------------------
Surf_amplitude_apex -- (#3 of the amplitude series)
**1 Year anniversary for the series**
Map created by Buck Nasty
Jail created by FAJ
------------------------------

This is a skill surf with 3 stages. (It is meant to be difficult!)

- Both teams spawn together without any weapons (no pistols or knives).

- The screenshots shown are NOT the best. I tried to get the overview of each level but they came out a bit sloppy.

How the jail works:
- The jail timers start counting once a player has beaten the first stage.
- After it the first stage has been beaten, the jail is active and the players that spawn in it are released every 20 seconds.
- After 9 releases (3 mins) it will count 20 seconds before the auto-kill engages.
- Also, after 3 mins, jump rope is disabled (The timer for this starts at round start).

Upon entering the jail you receive...
- Stage 1: Nothing
- Stage 2: A grenade
- Stage 3: Nothing, but your level of jail has grenade spawners

I'd rather not ask for constructive criticism cause I honestly don't care, this map is the way Faj & I like it. Although, compliments are welcome.

-- Buck Nasty

http://waspnest.net/
http://solidsurf.info/
